description:
See every detail of your chosen line. Smith continues to improve their goggles with new 4D MAG lens tech that increases your field of view by 25%. The magnetic (MAG) lens system lets you swap lenses super-fast, and ChromaPop offers exceptional clarity, high contrast, and colour optimization in challenging light conditions.

  • Designed to fit smaller faces
  • Responsive Fit™ adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes
  • BIRDSEYE™ vision is curved at the bottom to improves your field of view by 25% (compared to the I/O MAG)
  • Magnets with a lens carrier locking mechanism add security and prevent rotation
  • Push a lever at either side of the lens to release
  • Thermal lens eliminates fog during elevation changes
  • Articulating outrigger system allows for comfortable, pressure free wear, with or without a helmet
  • 3-layer DriWix foam provides a breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle
  • Includes a spare ChromaPop Storm Blue Sensor mirror with 55% visible light transmission
  • Includes an extra lens and a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith 4D MAG S Goggles
